title: Climate Change and Complex Systems: Mobile-Based Productive Failure Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and general understanding of complex systems
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals to systematically understand complex systems concepts related to climate change in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners explain nonlinear interactions in climate systems using agent-based simulation tools
Learners can analyze climate change cases by applying complex systems theory (feedback loops, adaptability, etc.).
Learners can solve proximal/distal transfer tasks with at least 80% accuracy in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
